title: Best of The Herd: 07/31/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/31/2018
description:
Colin discusses why Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James will still dominate next season, why Oakland Raiders DE Khalil Mack isn't getting the contract he wants, and why he wouldn't give up everything to get Washington Nationals OF Byrce Harper before the trade deadline. Also New Orleans Saints QB Drew Brees stops by The Herd. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
